products.title: Turin 25mm Shimmer Copper Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: The metallic range offers the best urban and contemporary feel of the metallic blind that will add a character to any space. Add something different to the style of any room with their metallic 25mm pulse venetian blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. Product id: db-dpfven0330 fabric colour: shimmer copper s25137 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.
